definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: The friendly relations between our two countries have been speeded to a new stage.
sentences.chinese: 我們兩國之間的友好關係已經推進到了一個新階段。

sentences.english: The friendly relationship between the two countries traces back to the last century.
sentences.chinese: 兩國間的友好關係追溯到上個世紀。

sentences.english: Li Zhaoxing said that China-Nepal relations are ever lasting.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星說，中尼友好關係源遠流長。

sentences.english: The Japanese government and people hope for friendly relations with China, said Hatoyama.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，日本政府和人民希望同中國發展友好關係。

sentences.english: He also noted that he hopes bilateral friendship will make long-term progress in the future.
sentences.chinese: 他還希望雙邊友好關係在未來取得長足進展。

sentences.english: To maintain and develop the overall friendly relations between China and Pakistan will benefit not only our present generations but also future generations.
sentences.chinese: 維護和發展好中巴全面友好關係功在當代，利在千秋。

sentences.english: May the friendship between our peoples be further developed and consolidated.
sentences.chinese: 祝兩國人民之間的友好關係進一步發展和鞏固。

sentences.english: He said that the CPPCC shares traditional friendly relations with the ROK National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 他說，中國全國政協與韓國國會有着傳統友好關係。

sentences.english: Shen stressed that the peoples of China and Iraq have traditional friendship.
sentences.chinese: 沈國放強調，中伊兩國人民有着傳統的友好關係。

sentences.english: The two countries are linked by bonds of friendship going back many years.
sentences.chinese: 兩國間的友好關係可以追朔到許多年以前。

sentences.english: Frequent cultural exchange will certainly help foster friendly relations between our two countries.
sentences.chinese: 頻繁的文化交流必定會促進我們兩國間的友好關係。

sentences.english: The rapprochement with the United States continued to dominate China's foreign affairs.
sentences.chinese: 當年中國外交事務的主調依然是和美國的友好關係。

sentences.english: He said since the establishment of their diplomatic ties 21 years ago, the two countries have always maintained friendly relations.
sentences.chinese: 他說，安巴與中國建交21年來一直保持着友好關係。

sentences.english: Because of China’s arrogance, amicable relations between the two countries in the future are in jeopardy.
sentences.chinese: 由於中國的傲慢，兩國友好關係的未來處於危險之中。

sentences.english: We extend you this accommodation in view of our friendly relations.
sentences.chinese: 鑑於我們的友好關係，我們特作此項通融。
首先，什麼是假設友好關係？
